name: Sacrifice Of The Beloved
description:
Some of the puzzles are story based so one has to pay attention to the story to solve them easily.

  • PLAYTIME : 30-40 MINS

NOTE : IT'S A WEIRD GAME BY A WEIRD PERSON  :|

  • CONTROLS:
  1. ' W, A, S, D' TO MOVE
  2. 'E' TO INTERACT
  3. 'MOUSE' TO LOOK AROUND
  4. 'SPACE' TO JUMP
  • MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:

{ BASED ON THE PC THIS GAME WAS DEVELOPED }

  1. RAM : 2GB
  2. OS : WINDOWS 7 32BIT
  3. GRAPHICS : GT210 1GB
  4. PROCESSOR : INTEL CORE2DUO E7500 2.93GHz
  5. GAME SIZE (AFTER EXTRACTION) : 207MB
